relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare recognized in first Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Cloud Application Platforms

Cloudflare is one of only twelve vendors, as well as the only Challenger recognized in the report.

Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Cloud Application Platforms report for its ability to execute and completeness of vision.

We believe this recognition is a testament to the Cloudflare Developer Platform's commitment to making serverless, AI, and edge computing primitives accessible to every developer to build and deploy fullstack applications to region: Earth.

![Cloudflare recognized in first Gartner - Landing Page - Illustration](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/3Xq5BcMVGj8ysKls55odq1/e45f9f6f69583934d1b0e800fcf6787d/Cloudflare-recognized-in-first-gartner-lp-illustration.png)
Gartner, "Magic Quadrant for Cloud Application Platforms", Analyst(s): Tigran Egiazarov, Mukul Saha, Anne Thomas, Steve Schwent, November 4th, 2024
